headline: Everton Women sign former Hammers midfielder Honoka Hayashi
summary: Everton have signed 26-year-old Japan international midfielder Honoka Hayashi, following her departure from West Ham United. She made 50 appearances for the Hammers over two seasons and internationally has 33 caps for her country, whom […]

headline: Scottish Women’s Championship will open with Falkirk derby
summary: The 2024/25 Scottish Women’s Championship and League One fixtures are out, with newly-promoted Stenhousemuir and Falkirk clashing on the opening day. In what is shaping up to be the most competitive and high-profile Championship season […]

headline: England Women’s U-19s lose out to Spain again in Euro semis
summary: England bowed out of the UEFA Women’s U-19 Championship with a 3-1 semi-final defeat to Spain in Lithuania. Spain’s Marissa put a chance wide in the opening minute, Cerys Brown made a crucial block from […]

headline: Back-to-back wins at Girls SuperCupNI for Man Utd and N.Ireland
summary: Manchester United and Northern Ireland both continued their winning starts in the SuperCupNI Premier Girls groups. Manchester United were 3-1 winners over Surf Select, while also in Group A Aston Villa sank USSSA Select 7-0 […]

headline: Sheffield United Women sign midfielder Monique Robinson
summary: Sheffield United have signed talented young midfielder Monique Robinson from Barclays Women’s Super League side Leicester City. Robinson progressed through the Foxes academy after initially being in the Blades youth setup at 16 and enjoyed […]

headline: Aston Villa Women secure permanent signing of Miri Taylor
summary: Miri Taylor is back with Aston Villa on a two-year deal, following last season’s loan spell from Liverpool. The 24-year-old midfielder, who made eight appearances after joining on loan in January, is now under contract […]

headline: Everton Women’s Aurora Galli signs new contract
summary: Midfielder Aurora Galli has extended her stay with Everton to a fourth season by signing a new contract with the club. The 27-year-old Italy international missed only three league matches last season, starting 19 times, […]

headline: Right-back Rachel Brown joins Southampton FC Women
summary: Southampton FC Women have signed Rachel Brown following her departure from fellow Barclays Women’s Championship side Sheffield United. She becomes the third former Blades player to join the Saints this summer, following on from the […]

headline: Gwalia United kick off rebrand with training session for schoolchildren
summary: Gwalia United kicked off its official rebrand at Penpych Community Primary School with a training session for the pupils. Children were led in the session by former pupil and Gwalia United captain, Cori Williams-Mills, as […]

headline: Spurs Women’s head coach Robert Vilahamn signs new contract
summary: Tottenham Hotspur Women’s head coach Robert Vilahamn has signed a new three-year contract with the club. The 41-year-old joined Spurs last summer from BK Häcken, guiding the team to an eight-game unbeaten run in all […]
